comment.text: This translation key is used for "Your Turn" badge title in a file filling form, indicating that the user's turn has started. It appears in the UI as a badge on buttons or dialog prompts when the form is in the "Your Turn" status.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'يتطلب هذا النموذج تعبئتكم' while understandable, is not the most natural or idiomatic way to convey 'This form requires your completion.' It translates to 'This form requires your filling' which is slightly different in nuance. A more suitable translation would emphasize the requirement of *submitting* or *finishing* the form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يتطلب هذا النموذج إكمالكم (Yatlub hatha al-namudhaj ikmalkum) - This form requires your completion.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'This form requires your completion' implies a requirement for the user to finish the form. The Spanish translation 'Este formulario requiere su participación' translates to 'This form requires your participation'. While participation is a component of completion, it doesn't accurately convey the original meaning. A more accurate translation would emphasize finishing or submitting the form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Este formulario requiere que lo complete.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tämä lomake vaatii sinun täyttävän sen' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.

The translation 'Ce formulaire doit être rempli par vous' is technically correct but sounds overly formal and a bit awkward in modern French. It literally translates to 'This form must be filled by you'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and idiomatic translation would be 'Ce formulaire doit être complété' or 'Vous devez remplir ce formulaire'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Խնդրում ենք լրացնել այս ձևը' translates to 'Please complete this form'. While understandable, it doesn't fully convey the sense of 'This form requires your completion'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the requirement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Ստիպված եք լրացնել այս ձևը' (You are required to complete this form) or 'Անհրաժեշտ է լրացնել այս ձևը' (It is necessary to complete this form).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'このフォームにはあなたの入力が必要です' while understandable, is a bit formal and not the most natural way to convey "This form requires your completion." A more natural translation would emphasize the need for the user to finish the form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このフォームの完了が必要です (Kono fōmu no kanryō ga hitsuyō desu) - 'Completion of this form is required.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ແບບຟອມນີ້ຕ້ອງການໃຫ້ທ່ານຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນ" literally translates to "This form requires you to fill in information." While conveying a similar meaning to "This form requires your completion," it's not a direct or natural equivalent.  'Completion' implies finishing something; 'filling in information' is more about providing data. A more accurate translation depending on the exact context might be something like 'ທ່ານຕ້ອງເຮັດແບບຟອມນີ້ໃຫ້ສໍາເລັດ' (tan tong het baep form ni hai samret - 'You must complete this form').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ທ່ານຕ້ອງເຮັດແບບຟອມນີ້ໃຫ້ສໍາເລັດ' or a more contextually accurate equivalent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dany formularz wymaga wypełnienia przez Ciebie' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Polish. A more natural phrasing would convey the sense of 'requiring your completion'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as 'Ten formularz wymaga Twojego wypełnienia' or 'Należy wypełnić ten formularz'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Este formulário deve ser preenchido por si' while technically correct, is overly formal and less natural than alternatives for the English 'This form requires your completion'. It implies obligation more strongly than a simple requirement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Este formulário precisa ser preenchido por você.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ විසින් පෝරමය සම්පූර්ණ කළ යුතුය (Oba visesin poramayama sampurna kala yeya)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit awkward. While grammatically correct, it doesn't flow naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ විසින් පෝරමය සම්පූර්ණ කළ යුතුය (Oba visesin poramayama sampurna kala yeya)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Tento formulár vám treba vyplniť' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'This form requires your completion'. It literally translates to 'This form you need to fill'. A better translation would convey the requirement more directly.

The Slovenian translation 'Ta obrazec zahteva vašo izpolnitev' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'This form requires your completion'. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat awkward. 'Izpolnitev' refers to the act of filling something out, and while 'completion' implies that, the phrase isn't the standard way to express that in Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ta obrazec morate izpolniti' (This form you must fill out) or 'Zahtevamo, da izpolnite ta obrazec' (We require you to fill out this form).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation is incomplete. It appears to be cut off and doesn't finish the sentence. The English phrase 'This form requires your completion' has missing content in the Serbian translation.

The translation "Ви повинні заповнити цю форму" (You must fill out this form) is too strong and doesn't convey the same politeness as the English "This form requires your completion."  It implies an obligation rather than a request.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more polite phrasing such as "Будь ласка, заповніть цю форму" (Please fill out this form) or "Необхідно заповнити цю форму" (It is necessary to fill out this form).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '该表单需要您完成填写' is too literal and a bit awkward. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Chinese. The phrase '完成填写' (complete filling) is redundant.
